title: Ranked Queues.
body:
Why are ranked queues still closed at 4am...
im sure we have enough player now.
its been a year or so and they still havent changed it..
i cry T_T

replies.body: I remember when ranked queues closed at 1am :3 It was only open till 4am on weekends

oh yeah i remember that.. but still i reckon they should leave it open all the time. we have enough players dont we?
like i dont know the reason why they close it at 4am

There are enough players to field a queue, but not enough to make queues balanced. If they kept ranked up during off-peak hours there'd be a lot of extremely unbalanced matches, or games which solely hinge on which team's Platinum player can carry harder.
this horse%%%% company has a nanny state complex. it completely blunts the market growth of its own product by pulling crap like this. remove the inhibitors and delayers to progress
